name: Tropical Paradise Resort
description: A luxurious resort located on a private island, offering stunning ocean views and top-notch amenities.

name: Alpine Chalet Retreat
description: A cozy chalet nestled in the mountains, perfect for a winter getaway with skiing and spa facilities.

name: City Escape Hotel
description: A modern hotel located in the heart of the city, offering easy access to shopping, dining, and entertainment.

name: Desert Getaway Resort
description: A unique resort located in the desert, offering luxury tents and a chance to experience the beauty of the dunes.

name: Beachfront Villa
description: A stunning villa located right on the beach, perfect for a relaxing getaway with family or friends.

name: National Park Lodge
description: A rustic lodge located in a national park, offering outdoor activities like hiking and wildlife watching.
